hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Song of Storms# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Light Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Green Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Crater# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to #3 Deku Scrubs#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Fire Keese Chest

GC (Maze).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Bottom of the Well#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##the Temple of Time## has #2# major items.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #2# major items.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Darunia's dance# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that plundering #Lake Hylia# is a foolish choice.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #a Zora Scale# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path of #gold#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Bow#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides #2 Deku Scrubs#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Green Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Fairy Bottle#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: It's so lonely being stuck here with nobody else to talk to...

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a record setting fish (adult)#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Water Trial Left Chest

KF (Storms Grotto).text: A broken stick is just as good as a Master Sword. Who knew?

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a pool guarded by a #Tektite#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Temple of Time# chimes with the music of #Zelda's Lullaby#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Deku Stick# and #a Strength Upgrade#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that Great Fairies outside #Hyrule and Ganon's castles# reward...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #a Hylian Loach#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: Did you know that ReDead won't attack if you walk very slowly?

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ice Trap#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #4# major items.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that plundering #the Forest Temple# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ice Trap#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that an #invisible spinning blade# in the Shadow Temple guards...^ #a Compass# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Visible Chest
Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Fairy Bottle#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Heavy Block Fourth Chest

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #Zora's River#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Right Side Chest

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that shooting a #target in the woods# grants #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path of #gold#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right
